svg.text: Context Window Memory Packing & Budget Management
From Simple Sequential Packing to Complex Hierarchical Selection Challenges

g.text: Information packed chronologically - First In, First Out (FIFO) when full
‚ùå Important early context gets lost (FIFO truncation)
‚ùå No prioritization - treats all information equally
Tree structure with summaries, but memory manager struggles with selection
TREE APPROACH PROBLEMS: Memory Manager Can't Choose Intelligently
‚ùì Selection Paralysis: Too many memory nodes, no clear priority
‚ùì Context Ignorance: Can't understand which memories relate to current query
‚ùì Compression Loss: Important details lost in hierarchical summaries
‚ùì Relevance Blind: No semantic understanding of memory importance
‚ùì Budget Overflow: Still hits context limits with poor selection
‚ùì Static Hierarchy: Tree structure doesn't adapt to query context
‚ùì Granularity Mismatch: Wrong level of detail for different queries
‚ùì Recency Bias: Recent != Relevant for current task

svg.text: Context window packing is like playing Tetris with information - but the memory manager is blindfolded! üß©ü§ñ
